name: lighthouse-badges
description: ðŸš¦Generate gh-badges (shields.io) based on Lighthouse performance.

scripts.docker:build: docker build --build-arg VCS_REF=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` --build-arg BUILD_DATE=`date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"` --build-arg VERSION=latest -t emazzotta/lighthouse-badges .
scripts.docker:system-test:run: docker run emazzotta/lighthouse-badges /bin/sh -c "lighthouse-badges --single-badge --save-report --urls https://emanuelemazzotta.com && EXEC_PATH=/home/chrome/reports npm run system-test:verify --prefix /home/lighthouse"
scripts.system-test:full-run: npm run system-test:clean && npm run system-test:reinstall && npm run run:npm -- --save-report --single-badge --urls 'https://emanuelemazzotta.com' && npm run system-test:verify && npm run system-test:clean
scripts.system-test:light-run: npm run system-test:clean && npm run run:local -- --save-report --single-badge --urls 'https://emanuelemazzotta.com' && npm run system-test:verify && npm run system-test:clean

author: Emanuele Mazzotta
